title: lol summoner information

embed.description: Yes. Riot has confirmed multiple times that LSI has the same status as most other 3rd party services such as LoL Replay, lolking, quickfind, lolnexus etc.; meaning that while they might impose a violation of the terms of use Riot is aware of that and chose not to enforce.

body: does anyone use this? is it safe?

replies.body: omg i just tried it. so good wth.
